issue.title: [Java] Remove Netty dependency from arrow-vector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Cleanup remaining usage of Netty from arrow-vector and remove as a dependency after ARROW-9300.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9356?focusedCommentId=17156395) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~bryanc]` `[~rymurr]` is this on your critical path for the next couple days?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9356?focusedCommentId=17156404) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I took a quick look and don't think I could do this in the next couple of days. It's fine to push off until the next release.
